job.title: Java Software Engineer-Web Services-Mid Level
job.description: Purpose of JobltbrgtltbrgtWe are currently seeking talented Java Software Engineers  Mid Level for our Phoenix AZ facility for teams inside our Chief Administrative Office GroupltbrgtltbrgtUSAA Java Software Engineers create and maintain APIs for our business software applications that our members use Done well many may never realize or appreciate how critical these APIs are or how weve made them simpler Faster Safer Yet they help make our members lives better Its a great challenge and responsibilityltbrgtltbrgtHere you will invent Youll design and test Youll take risks Youll create new technology but the impact youll make on our members will be far more significantltbrgtltbrgtAs a Java Engineer it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and qualityltbrgtltbrgtJob RequirementsltbrgtltbrgtAs a Java Engineer you are expected to be able to function in a fastpaced environment driving innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative development ensuring quality is built into all solutions leveraging TDD Your responsibilities will require you to be knowledgeable in API development You will be a part of teams of developers guiding on engineering and architecture best practices as well as demonstrate the ability to partner and engage with other engineers and architects You will work closely with business clients and UI designers to analyze user requirements code applications and customize andor integrate commercial software packages for both internal employees and external memberfacing applications across multiple platformsltbrgtltbrgtAs a Java Engineer it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and qualityltbrgtltbrgtThis Job Posting is for multiple openings available in 2021ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout USAAltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelltbrgtltbrgtUSAA Careers  World Class Benefits 31 secondsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPrimary ResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtIdentifies and manages existing and emerging risks that stem from business activities and the job roleltligtltligtEnsures risks associated with business activities are effectively identified measured monitored and controlled ltligtltligtFollows written risk and compliance policies and procedures for business activitiesltligtltligtDesign develop code and test complex technical solutions collaborating with senior engineersltligtltligtMay lead codedesign reviews to ensure smooth daily operations and accurate planning at a team levelltligtltligtMay begin to organize work and lead team to deliver features and solutionsltligtltligtResolves complex production issues with independence by troubleshooting complex applications and systems independentlyltligtltligtMay begin mentoring junior engineersltbrgtltligtltulgtWhen you apply for this position you will be required to answer some initial questions This will take approximately 5 minutes Once you begin the questions you will not be able to finish them at a later time and you will not be able to change your responsesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtMinimum RequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in related field of study OR Certification from an approved technical field of study OR 4 additional years of IT experience beyond the minimum required in lieu of a degree ltligtltligtAND 4 years of software engineeringdevelopment experience utilizing Java with at least 1 years experience working with REST Web ServicesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Experienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years in REST frameworks with focus on API developmentltligtltligt2 years in AGILE methodologyltligtltligt1 years experience working with JavaScriptltligtltligt2 years experience integrating with backend services like JMS J2C ORM frameworks Hibernate JPA JDO etc JDBCltligtltligtExperience building APIs with Spring BootltligtltligtExperience with event driven frameworks such as Kafka RabbitMQ IBM MQltligtltligtAbility to implement container based APIs using a container frameworks OpenShift Docker or KubernetesltligtltligtRelational Database design and optimization with Oracle DB2 MySQL PostgressltligtltligtFamiliar with Gradle GIT GitHUB GITLab etc around continuous integration and continuous delivery infrastructureltligtltligtExperience testing in REST servicesltligtltligtExperience in design and develop automated test frameworkltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtDesired CharacteristicsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtUSAA Java Engineers create innovative solutions that impact our members Collectively we areltbrgtltulgtltligtCurious and excited by new ideasltligtltligtEnergized by a fastpaced environmentltligtltligtAble to understand and translate business needs into leadingedge technologyltligtltligtComfortable working as part of a connected team but selfmotivatedltligtltligtCommunityfocused dependable and committedltligtltligtExceptionally detailorientedltbrgtltligtltulgtThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtCompensationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 8820000  15890000  this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work locationltbrgtltbrgtEmployees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsltbrgtltulgtltligtGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averageltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtShift premiumltstronggt will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtBenefits ltstronggtAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs Additionally our career path planning and continuing education assists employees with their professional goalsltbrgtltbrgtPlease click on the link below for more detailsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtUSAA Total RewardsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtRelocationltstronggt assistance is ltstronggtnotltstronggt ltstronggtavailableltstronggt for this position
